These prisoners were given cosmetic surgery to appear Western and fake IDs and evacuated with other Americans, but mostly Europeans, in the Great Exodus from Wuhan. As we debate over the virus the Chinese government triumphs over its success, but unknown to the ChiComs the satellites they are killing are actually owned by PornHub to handle the excess demand of millions of people now stuck in quarantine.
